keyMoments.title: Shiki's Escape from Impel Down
keyMoments.description: Shiki becomes the first prisoner to escape from Impel Down by cutting off his own legs and using his Devil Fruit powers to levitate away.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Shiki as a legendary pirate who accomplished the impossible and hurt the prison's pride.

keyMoments.title: Shiki's First Anime Appearance
keyMoments.description: Shiki makes his first appearance in the anime through flashbacks, demonstrating his power and legendary status.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces one of the most powerful pirates from Roger's era to the anime.

keyMoments.title: Fuwa Fuwa no Mi Demonstration
keyMoments.description: Shiki demonstrates his Float-Float Fruit abilities during his escape from Impel Down.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals one of the most powerful Paramecia-type Devil Fruits.

statusHistory.reason: Imprisoned in Impel Down before his escape

age: Unknown (escaped Impel Down 20 years before episode)

abilities.description: Shiki can levitate himself and non-living objects he has touched, allowing him to fly and manipulate his surroundings.

relationships.description: Magellan was the vice warden of Impel Down when Shiki escaped, and his escape hurt Magellan's pride.

evolutionMoments.description: Shiki escapes from Impel Down under Magellan's watch.

reveals.information: Possesses the Fuwa Fuwa no Mi Devil Fruit
First prisoner to escape from Impel Down by cutting off his own legs
Uses his swords as prosthetic legs after cutting off his real legs

keyMoments.title: Boss Attacks the Thousand Sunny
keyMoments.description: Boss appears as a giant horned beetle and attacks the Straw Hat Pirates' ship after eating Brook's catch.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Boss as a key character in the Little East Blue arc.

keyMoments.title: Battle with Luffy
keyMoments.description: Boss fights with Luffy atop the Thousand Sunny's sail, demonstrating its strength and size.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Boss's combat abilities and Luffy's interest in recruiting it.

abilities.description: Boss possesses immense strength due to its size as a giant horned beetle.
Boss can fly and carry multiple people on its back.

relationships.description: Boss is Yoko's loyal companion and follows her commands.

evolutionMoments.description: Boss is shown to be Yoko's companion and protector.

reveals.information: Escaped from Shiki, making it a target for the Amigo Pirates

keyMoments.title: Yoko Orders Boss to Attack Pirates
keyMoments.description: Yoko sees the Straw Hat Pirates' ship and orders Boss to attack them, showing her hatred for all pirates.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Yoko and establishes her anti-pirate sentiment due to her father's death.

relationships.description: Yoko is Boss's owner and companion.

evolutionMoments.description: Yoko commands Boss to attack the Straw Hats.

reveals.information: Her father was a Marine who died protecting the village from pirates
Hates all pirates due to her father's death

keyMoments.title: Amigo Pirates Approach
keyMoments.description: Largo and his brother Corto lead their crew toward Kansorn Island to capture Boss on Shiki's orders.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Largo as one of the arc's antagonists.

keyMoments.title: Defeated by Luffy's Gear Third
keyMoments.description: Largo is defeated by Luffy using Gear Third, being smashed into his own ship.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the power gap between the Straw Hats and the Amigo Pirates.

relationships.description: Largo and Corto are brothers who lead the Amigo Pirates together.

evolutionMoments.description: Introduced as brothers working for Shiki.

relationships.description: Largo works under Shiki's orders to capture Boss.

evolutionMoments.description: Largo is shown to be working for Shiki.

keyMoments.title: Amigo Pirates Approach
keyMoments.description: Corto and his brother Largo lead their crew toward Kansorn Island to capture Boss on Shiki's orders.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Corto as one of the arc's antagonists.

relationships.description: Corto and Largo are brothers who lead the Amigo Pirates together.

evolutionMoments.description: Introduced as brothers working for Shiki.

relationships.description: Corto works under Shiki's orders to capture Boss.

evolutionMoments.description: Corto is shown to be working for Shiki.

keyMoments.title: Magellan During Shiki's Escape
keyMoments.description: Magellan, as vice warden of Impel Down, witnesses Shiki's escape and is shocked when he discovers Shiki cut off his own legs.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the impact of Shiki's escape on Impel Down and Magellan's reputation.

relationships.description: Shiki's escape hurt Magellan's pride as vice warden.

evolutionMoments.description: Magellan witnesses Shiki's escape from Impel Down.

reveals.information: Was vice warden of Impel Down during Shiki's escape 20 years ago
